results.name: Largest prime factor of 5^n - 1.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..448 (terms 1..100 from Vincenzo Librandi)
S. S. Wagstaff, Jr., The Cunningham Project
xref: Cf. A074478 (largest prime factor of 5^n + 1), A074477 (largest prime factor of 3^n - 1), A074249 (largest prime factor of 7^n - 1).
Cf. similar sequences listed in A274906.
results.author: _Rick L. Shepherd_, Aug 23 2002
